name: event_search
description: Find events and filter your search by location, date, availability, and much more.

sort_by.description: Sorting order of the search result. Allowable values : 'name,asc', 'name,desc', 'date,asc', 'date,desc', 'relevance,asc', 'relevance,desc', 'distance,asc', 'name,date,asc', 'name,date,desc', 'date,name,asc', 'date,name,desc', 'distance,date,asc', 'onSaleStartDate,asc', 'id,asc', 'venueName,asc', 'venueName,desc', 'random'.

radius.description: Radius of the area in which we want to search for events.

unit.description: Unit of the radius. Allowable values :'miles', 'km'.

source.description: Filter entities by its primary source name OR publishing source name. Allowable values :'ticketmaster', 'universe', 'frontgate', 'tmr'.

locale.description: The locale in ISO code format. Multiple comma-separated values can be provided. When omitting the country part of the code (e.g. only 'en' or 'fr') then the first matching locale is used. When using a '*' it matches all locales. '*' can only be used at the end (e.g. 'en-us,en,*').

startDateTime.description: Filter with a start date after this date.

endDateTime.description: Filter with a start date before this date.

onsaleStartDateTime.description: Filter with onsale start date after this date.

onsaleEndDateTime.description: Filter with onsale end date before this date.

classificationId.description: Filter by classification id: id of any segment, genre, sub-genre, type, sub-type. Negative filtering is supported by using the following format '-'. Be aware that negative filters may cause decreased performance.

includeFamily.description: Filter by classification that are family-friendly. Allowable values: 'yes', 'no', 'only'.

domain.description: Filter entities based on domains they are available on.

name: get_event_details
description: Get details for a specific event using the unique identifier for the event. This includes the venue and location, the attraction(s), and the Ticketmaster Website URL for purchasing tickets for the event.

locale.description: The locale in ISO code format. Multiple comma-separated values can be provided. When omitting the country part of the code (e.g. only 'en' or 'fr') then the first matching locale is used. When using a '*' it matches all locales. '*' can only be used at the end (e.g. 'en-us,en,*').

domain.description: Filter entities based on domains they are available on.

description: Find search suggestions and filter your suggestions by location, source, etc.

startEndDateTime.description: Filter event where event start and end date overlap this range.

resource.description: which resources to include in the suggest response, defaults to all resources.

domain.description: Filter entities based on domains they are available on.

name: ask_to_user
description: You can ask user for guidance when you think you need more information to handle the task, but you should use this tool as less as you can.

question.description: The question you want to ask to user.

name: finish
description: Finish the task and give your answer.
